mckay.utilities.gui.templates

Class HelpDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • mckay.utilities.gui.templates.HelpDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class HelpDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    Dialog box that allows users to read help (or other) documents in HTML format. Has two frames. The left one displays a list of contents and the right one displays the current help page. Any links clicked on in either frame will be displayed in the right frame.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • HelpDialog

        public HelpDialog(java.lang.String contents_page_path,
          java.lang.String default_page_path)
        Set up the dialog box and display the default help file.
        Parameters:
        contents_page_path - The path to the HTML page containing the list of help topics.
        default_page_path - The path to the HTML page containing the default help page.
